TopicTitle: Kerbal technology used to win the America's Cup!!!!

Articles.Content:
It is being widely reported that team Oracle employed a well known Kerbal technology on their boat to win the America's Cup this week. The key technology was an electronic leveling device for their hydrofoils known as a "Stability Augmentation System", or SAS.

Details here: http://www.3news.co.nz/Kiwi-fans-ask-Did-Oracle-cheat/tabid/415/articleID/314800/Default.aspx

Big win for Kerbals everywhere!
I sail, and I do believe that is known as 'cheating' The crew are meant to balance the boat. Not some automatic adjustment system.
Did they base it off the Old SAS or the New one?
